name: GLOBAL_TAG_TITLE_SUFFIX
value: - UKIMS

name: GLOBAL_SERVICE_NAME
value: The name of the service

name: START_H1
value: Check an EORI number for UK Internal Market Scheme (UKIMS) authorisation

name: START_PARA_1
value: Use this service to find out if a business has UK Internal Market Scheme (UKIMS) authorisation by checking their EORI number.

name: START_PARA_2
value: A business must have UKIMS authorisation to move qualifying goods from GB (England, Scotland and Wales) to Northern Ireland (NI) without paperwork, checks or duties.

name: START_WELSH_LINK_TEXT
value: This service is also available

name: START_WELSH_LINK_ANCHOR
value: in Welsh (Cymraeg)

name: ENTER_SINGLE_H1
value: What is the EORI number of the business you want to check?

name: ENTER_SINGLE_HINT
value: The first 2 letters are the country code, like GB or XI. This is followed by 12 or 15 digits, like GB123456123456.

name: ENTER_SINGLE_CTA
value: Continue

name: ENTER_ERROR_NO_NUMBER_TOP
value: You must enter an EORI number to continue

name: ENTER_ERROR_NO_NUMBER_INPUT
value: Enter an EORI number

name: ENTER_ERROR_PREFIX_TOP
value: EORI number must start with GB or XI

name: ENTER_ERROR_PREFIX_INPUT
value: Re-enter the EORI number with the correct prefix

name: ENTER_ERROR_NUMBER_LENGTH_TOP
value: EORI number must be 12 or 15 digits long

name: ENTER_ERROR_NUMBER_LENGTH_INPUT
value: Re-enter an EORI number with the correct number of digits

name: SUCCESS_PAGE_NAME
value: EORI number results

name: SUCCESS_H1_BANNER_AFTER_EORI
value: has UKIMS authorisation

name: SUCCESS_PARA_1
value: There is no EU duty payable on these goods as they're 'not at risk' of moving to the EU.

name: FAIL_H1
value: does not have UKIMS authorisation

name: FAIL_PARA_1
value: The business this EORI number matches is not authorised to use the UK Internal Market Scheme
